abstract.p: Michael Pravica letter disputes Richard Perle's July 13 Op-Ed article arguing case for national missile defense system

block.p: Richard Perle's July 13 Op-Ed article, ''A Better Way to Build a Missile Defense,'' demonstrates just how unrealistic the supporters of a national missile defense system are. With so many complex technical problems that remain to be solved (and not inexpensively), we are many years away from developing a working, fail-safe system. By that time, other countries will have developed their own methods to counteract this defense.

Richard Perle's July 13 Op-Ed article, ''A Better Way to Build a Missile Defense,'' demonstrates just how unrealistic the supporters of a national missile defense system are. With so many complex technical problems that remain to be solved (and not inexpensively), we are many years away from developing a working, fail-safe system. By that time, other countries will have developed their own methods to counteract this defense.

Instead of building invisible, isolationist and defensive walls and provoking a new arms race, we are better off pursuing our cooperation with other countries on peaceful projects like the international space station that will benefit all humanity.
MICHAEL PRAVICA Las Vegas, N.M., July 13, 2000
